title: Emergency Transport
name: Ambulance Services
description: Emergency and non-emergency ambulance services available 24/7 to transport patients safely and promptly.

title: Mobile Oxygen
name: Oxygen on Wheel
description: Mobile oxygen services providing oxygen therapy to patients in need during transit or at home.

title: In-House Pharmacy
name: Pharmacy on Clinic
description: On-site pharmacy providing a wide range of prescription medications and over-the-counter drugs.

title: Round-the-Clock Care
name: On-duty Doctors
description: Qualified and experienced doctors available around the clock to attend to medical emergencies and routine check-ups.

title: Always Available
name: 24/7 Medical Emergency
description: Comprehensive emergency care services available at any time of the day or night to handle critical medical situations.

title: Remote Consultations
name: Telemedicine Services
description: Remote consultations with healthcare professionals using video calls, phone calls, and online chat for non-urgent medical advice.
